actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the deduction for net capital gains from 60 percent to 70 percent and to reduce to 6 months the holding period required for long-term capital gain treatment.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the capital gains deduction from 60 to 70 percent. Reduces from one year to six months the holding period requirement for long-term capital gain treatment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the deduction for net capital gains from 60 percent to 70 percent and to reduce to 6 months the holding period required for long-term capital gain treatment.
